TopicTitle: Mod to Help with a Rescue Mission and Practical Use for satallites

Articles.Content: Hey guys, I just recently bought the full version of Kerbal and i accidentally trapped one of my poor astronauts in orbit. Is there am addon that adds some kind capsule where extra astronauts can stay? Also, are there any mods that make setting up satellites practical? Thanks for any help you might have.
Yes, I'm making satellites practical and have a use. But it will take a while.

There's a crew tank in the same thread as Damned Aerospace.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9243-v0-16-Damned-Aerospace-Version-1-5-2-Crewtank?highlight=crew+tank

The best part? It doesn't require ANY plugins!

As for satellites, well, can't help you there.
Sweet, thanks! Also, what's the best mod with solar panels that adds them with a good use?
